net.tomp2p.dht

Class DHTBuilder<K extends DHTBuilder<K>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tomp2p.connection.DefaultConnectionConfiguration
      • net.tomp2p.dht.DHTBuilder<K>
  • Type Parameters:
    K -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionConfiguration, BasicBuilder<K>, Builder, SignatureBuilder<K>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddBuilder, DigestBuilder, GetBuilder, ParallelRequestBuilder, PutBuilder, RemoveBuilder, SendBuilder

    public abstract class DHTBuilder<K extends DHTBuilder<K>>
extends DefaultConnectionConfiguration
implements BasicBuilder<K>, ConnectionConfiguration, SignatureBuilder<K>
    Every DHT builder has those methods in common.
    Author:
    Thomas Bocek

      • isProtectDomain

        public boolean isProtectDomain()
        Returns:
        Set to true if the domain should be set to protected. This means that this domain is flagged an a public key is stored for this entry. An update or removal can only be made with the matching private key.

      • protectDomain

        public K protectDomain(boolean protectDomain)
        Parameters:
        protectDomain - Set to true if the domain should be set to protected. This means that this domain is flagged an a public key is stored for this entry. An update or removal can only be made with the matching private key.
        Returns:
        This class

      • protectDomain

        public K protectDomain()
        Returns:
        Set to true if the domain should be set to protected. This means that this domain is flagged an a public key is stored for this entry. An update or removal can only be made with the matching private key.

        public K streaming(boolean streaming)
